title: Tuesday Post Show (06-22-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (06-22-21)
description:
Bobby starts the show by checking in with Eddie who is still walking and going down into a valley. For the first time we hear him sound a little defeated. Bobby also talks about how some people have brain damage because of COVID. Amy also talks about trying to live out an item from her bucket list by going to Montana but can’t find anything available.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
